subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Rutgers-Kansas State Texas Bowl will be available on the NFL Network as part of a free preview from Dec. 24-30, allowing Scarlet Knights fans in the New York-New Jersey area to see the game.
snippet: The Rutgers-Kansas State Texas Bowl will be available on the NFL Network as part of a free preview from Dec. 24-30, allowing Scarlet Knights fans in the New York-New Jersey area to see the game.
